roleset.name: to approve
roleset.note: RATIFY-V NOTES: Frames file for 'ratify' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from ratify.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: By 1987 , then-Speaker Jim Wright was discussing arms control in Moscow with Mikhail Gorbachev and then attempting [*-1] to direct the president , through an appropriations rider , [*-2]to treat the Soviets as though the Senate had ratified SALT II .

example.name: all arguments
example.text: The broadcasters were , after all , documenting the game , ratifying its occurrence for millions outside the Stick .
